overview: Elder Esplin is everything one would expect of a Zone Leader: respectful, attentive, dutiful. Not only that, he's blessed with killer good looks and a tight, firm body. He seems only to have one problem: a few months into his mission; he found himself questioning the teachings of the church. He couldn't quite put his finger on it but felt like something was missing. This was further complicated by his intensely repressed sexual urges. Luckily for him, his companion shared with him the secrets of the Order, and he's found something he could believe in!
title: Elder Esplin: Chapters 1-4
